text: ` ` This Is Us'' is undoubtedly the breakout broadcast TV series of the past three years : Nothing has rivaled the show's grasp on the zeitgeist more than the NBC drama, and that doesn't seem to be changing anytime soon. Part of what has driven the success of the Dan Fogelman - created series is its emotional punch - - the ability it has to leave you crying tears of joy or happiness or both - - week after week. But another reason for its success is its deeply talented roster of stars from the adults all the way to the young actors. One of those young stars is 11 - year - old Parker Bates, who plays young Kevin Pearson.
